    V(D)J analysis

Function reference

Manipulate

import_vdj()
Import V(D)J data
fetch_vdj()
Fetch V(D)J data from object
filter_vdj()
Filter V(D)J data in object
summarize_vdj()
Summarize V(D)J data for each cell
mutate_vdj()
Modify V(D)J data in object
mutate_meta()
Modify object meta.data

Calculate

calc_diversity()
Calculate repertoire diversity
calc_frequency()
Calculate frequency of cell groups present in the object
calc_gene_usage()
Calculate V(D)J gene segment usage
calc_similarity()
Calculate repertoire overlap
define_clonotypes()
Define clonotypes based on V(D)J data

Plotting

plot_clonal_abundance()
Plot clonotype abundance
plot_diversity()
Plot repertoire diversity
plot_features() plot_vdj_feature()
Create 2D feature plot
plot_frequency()
Plot frequency of cell groups/labels present in the object
plot_gene_usage()
Plot V(D)J gene usage
plot_similarity()
Plot repertoire overlap
plot_vdj() plot_vdj_reads() plot_cdr3_length() plot_vdj_mutations()
Plot continuous V(D)J data
djvdj_theme()
Theme for djvdj plotting functions

Data

tiny_so
A tiny Seurat object
vdj_so
A tiny Seurat object with V(D)J data
tiny_sce
A tiny SingleCellExperiment object
vdj_sce
A tiny SingleCellExperiment object with V(D)J data

On this page

An R package developed by the RNA Bioscience Initiative
